mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM T2_STAY_TBL S INNER JOIN T2_CODE_TYPE C ON S.STAY_KIND = C.C_KIND LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MIN(ROOM_PRICE) AS MIN_PRICE, STAY_NO, PEOPLE_MAX FROM T2_ROOM_TBL GROUP BY STAY_NO ) R ON S.STAY_NO = R.STAY_NO LEFT JOIN T2_STAY_IMG_TBL I ON S.STAY_NO = I.STAY_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS JJIMCHECK, STAY_NO FROM T2_JJIM_TBL J INNER JOIN T2_STAY_TBL S ON S.STAY_NO = J.PRODUCT_NO WHERE J.U_ID = #{uId} GROUP BY STAY_NO ) J ON J.STAY_NO = S.STAY_NO WHERE 1=1
AND STAY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{stayKeyword},'%')
AND S.STAY_NO IN ( SELECT STAY_NO FROM T2_STAY_SERVICE_TBL WHERE SERVICE_NO = #{serviceNo} )
SELECT * FROM T2_ROOM_TBL R LEFT JOIN T2_ROOM_IMG_TBL I ON R.ROOM_NO = I.ROOM_NO WHERE STAY_NO = #{stayNo} AND ROOM_DELYN = 'N'
SELECT * FROM T2_STAY_TBL S INNER JOIN T2_CODE_TYPE C ON S.STAY_KIND = C.C_KIND LEFT JOIN T2_STAY_IMG_TBL I ON S.STAY_NO = I.STAY_NO WHERE S.STAY_NO = #{stayNo} AND S_DELYN = 'N'
SELECT * FROM T2_STAY_TBL S INNER JOIN T2_CODE_TYPE C ON S.STAY_KIND = C.C_KIND
